thread.title: Re: Actor who ambushed Mike Pence at Broadway show expects political speeches at Oscars
thread.title_full: Re: Actor who ambushed Mike Pence at Broadway show expects political speeches at Oscars

author: Maxx
title: Re: Actor who ambushed Mike Pence at Broadway show expects political speeches at Oscars
text:
Actor who ambushed Mike Pence at Broadway show expects political speeches at Oscars Posted at 7:20   
Predicting the winners at the Academy Awards can be fun sometimes, particularly those years when the general public has actually seen some of the films nominated. 
Here’s another bold Oscar prediction courtesy of “Hamilton” actor Brandon Victor Dixon, who believes calling out audience member Mike Pence from the stage and reading a prepared statement constituted a “conversation.” He’s guessing … wait for it … there will be a political speech or two at this year’s Academy Awards. 'Hamilton' actor who lectured @MikePenceVP says he expects political speeches at Oscars @CNNPolitics https://t.co/h04UcOxfzN 
— Michael Smerconish (@smerconish) February 25, 2017 @smerconish @MikePenceVP @CNNPolitics of course because they have the worlds stage and they can't help themselves
